About Me

I am a front-end web developer with almost two years of experience developing the
UI for websites of various complexity. My core specialization is translating Figma
and Photoshop designs into responsive websites using industry's best practicces
and technologies such as HTML/CSS, Sass, Gulp, Git, javascript and JQuery.
I am excited about learning new technologies and am currently focused on a more
advanced Javascript programming with emphasis ReactJS an NodeJS.

See my resume!
